name: Dogma: Valtalma
description:
Our team presents a demo version of the prologue of an adventure game in the genre of a visual novel called "DOGMA: VALTALMA". Work specifically on this part of the game lasted more than 6 months. At this stage, the game is available for a personal computer.We will also be glad of your assessment: pros and cons. 

Plot: It all starts with the fact that a guy named Johan finds himself in a place unfamiliar to him. He wants to understand how he got here, and indulges in memories. The first thing he remembers is a turning point in his life from childhood. How the plot will develop further, the player decides.
